actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution urging the denial of all United States trade credits and economic assistance to the Soviet Union.

summary.text: Requires the President to: (1) immediately suspend any extension of official trade credits or other forms of U.S. economic assistance to the Soviet Union; and (2) direct U.S. executive directors of international financial institutions to vote to bar assistance from such institutions to the Soviet Union until the President finds that Soviet military forces have relinquished control of political institutions, communications facilities, and other buildings or property of the Baltic States and the Soviet President has entered into good faith negotiations with the representatives of the democratically-elected governments of the Baltic States regarding their future status vis-a-vis the rest of the Soviet Union.

titles.title: A resolution urging the denial of all United States trade credits and economic assistance to the Soviet Union.
